Name: Unclear Requirements
Description: Unclear or changing requirements lead to confusion and rework

Name: Tight Deadlines
Description: Aggressive sprint deadlines lead to time pressure and stress

Name: Overload
Description: Excessive workload or task complexity leads to burnout

Name: Lack of Autonomy
Description: Micromanaging or lack of decision-making authority leads to frustration

Name: Poor Communication
Description: Inadequate communication among team members leads to misunderstandings

Name: Insufficient Resources
Description: Lack of necessary tools, training, or support leads to frustration

Name: Conflict
Description: Interpersonal conflicts or disagreements lead to stress and tension

Name: Unrealistic Expectations
Description: Unrealistic expectations from stakeholders or management lead to pressure

Name: Lack of Feedback
Description: Insufficient or unclear feedback leads to confusion and uncertainty

Name: Technical Debt
Description: Accumulated technical debt leads to increased complexity and stress

Name: Sprint Planning Issues
Description: Poor sprint planning or estimation leads to unrealistic expectations

Name: Stakeholder Pressure
Description: Pressure from stakeholders to deliver quickly or meet specific requirements

Name: Team Dynamics
Description: Poor team dynamics or lack of cohesion leads to stress and tension

Name: Burnout
Description: Prolonged periods of stress and overwork lead to burnout

Name: Lack of Recognition
Description: Lack of recognition or appreciation for work done leads to demotivation
